TopicTitle: [Question] Is it possible to have more that one KSC?

Articles.Content: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9396-0-16-ISA-MapSat-Satellite-mapping-module-and-map-generation-tool-v3-1-0 mentions multiple KSC positions (Multiple KSC's), anyone know if this is possible? If so, how can it be done?

Hi goraine, there are two space centers on Kerbin, and there was one on the Mun, the Mun center has been removed I think and the second KSC on Kerbin is an abandoned site with no runway.

These KSC's are either a product of the procedural terrain or are hard coded, for what reason only the Developers know, and there is no way for modders to add or move these sites, at lest currently.

So yes, it is possible, but no, it cannot be done by anyone outside of the Squad programming team.
Thanks, just saw a youtube vid showing a flight the the other KSC, but i didnt realize there used to be one on the Mun!
I think its somewhere west of the main KSC, in a small patch of hills.
COOL , i went there today with my plane!
The pink markers lead to the other KSC.

I remember seeing on a dev thread awhile ago that these were products of testing different features and the one was left in by mistake but stayed due to popularity

But to make your own isnt really possible but I believe that the orbital construction mod kind of allows this
